about_the_game:
THIS GAME IS DESIGNED TO BE ENJOYED FOR ABOUT 10 HOURS

---------------------------------

Chase Fox's sixth game.

Truth Universally Acknowledged is a Dating SIm game that lets you play as a teenage boy named Talay and help him win the heart of eight different love interests.

Story

A new school year comes with a new student, Talay. You are Talay and Talay is you. Help him win the heart of 8 romancable characters in this whimsical school.

Genre

Romantic Comedy, Dating Sim, Visual novel

Features

  • Original Art, Music & Sound Design

Eight Romancable Characters

  • Miy

    A very cheerful person with a cooking skills that is quite extroadinary. He also owns a cafe.

  • Courtney

    He is a bookmaker, magical individual who imbues a book with so much magic through their writing and makes the book comes alive. He is very queit and tend to keep to himself.

  • Kit

    A detective who specialized in treasure hunting. He sometimes forgets to take off his detective hat when he is not on the job. He is also quite shy and awkward individual.

  • August

    An annoyingly charming a famous celebrity who is mischevious and playful in nature. Because he is famous, the closer you are with him, closer you are to scandal.

  • Blake

    August's personal manager. Highly competent at his job and his writing abilities but he seems to put the writing skills to no good use and just left them sit in a drawer inside his mind.

  • Emilia

    Another bookmaker, one that is better than Courtney and one of the best in the world. She has been Courtney's friend since they were little. Determined and seems to excel in everything.

  • Claire

    A sweet person who is a waiter at Miy's cafe. An optimistic soul who have problems with managing others to not be in love with her.

  • Secret Datable Character

    ???

  • Reaction Mechanics
    Gone, read and read and read. In this game you could react to every line of dialogue in the game. And the game will remember your reactions and shape your story. You might become one's enemy or become the love of their life based on how you choose to react.

  • Conversation Skills
    You can use skill's to help Talay with finding the correct reactions and have the smoothest conversation with characters.

  • Cooking
    A mini cooking system. Filling Talay's hunger bar so that he is not miserable all the time and ruined his chance of winning the heart of the romancable characters.

  • Dress-Up
    Dress Talay up as you wish. While doing that you might also want to fill Talay's confidence bar to maximize the chance of him winning the heart of the romancable characters.

  • 64 endings

    This game has 64 endings, 8 for each romancable characters.

  • 100+ Cgs


    ---------------------------------

    Story, Art, Music and Sound Design
    by ChaseFOX

    Proofread and Developmental Writing
    by Eskay

    ---------------------------------
